articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Spotify will show pricing options outside its iOS app in the EU — if Apple lets it - The Verge
articles.description: Spotify says it will start putting pricing information in the EU version of its app, which comes after a decision from the European Commission blocked Apple’s anti-steering policy for music streaming apps.
articles.content:
Spotify is about to put Apples new App Store policies to the test

articles.title: Here's how Android, Search, and Chrome will change for EU users this week - Android Authority
articles.description: From more user-choice screens to alternative Play Store billing and major Search changes, Google is making big changes in the EU.
articles.content:
• Google has revealed how Android, Chrome, and Search will change for users in Europe.

articles.title: Elon Musk and X/Twitter Sued for $128 Million Over Alleged Unpaid Severance - IGN
articles.description: Elon Musk and X/Twitter are being sued for $128 million by former CEO Parag Agrawal and other executives over alleged unpaid severance.
